You’ll find everything from add-on content for recent releases right though to full-on games like the PS5 version of Forza Horizon 5 at 40% off the list price – it is now down from $60 to $35.99. Just be sure to scope out the first gameplay footage and release details for the new  Forza Horizon 6.

items.title: Just $12 today gets you Anker’s 5-in-1 USB-C hub with 4K HDMI to upgrade your laptop workstation (40% off)
items.summary:
Anker 5-in-1 USB-C Hub with 4K HDMI out

Buy for $12 (Reg. $20)

What we love

This Anker 5-in-1 USB-C hub is a solid pick if you want to expand the connectivity on your MacBook or Windows laptop. Its compact, travel-friendly design makes it easy to slip into your everyday carry, while still adding a useful mix of ports to your workstation. You get a 90W USB-C Power Delivery port for charging, a 4K HDMI output for external displays, and three USB-A ports—one offering fast 5Gb/s USB 3.0 speeds, with the other two running at standard USB 2.0 480Mb/s speeds.

items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Logitech’s POP ICON keyboard and mouse combo in Lilac down to $39.97 shipped. This is originally a $70 combo that gets you the brand’s POP ICON keyboard and mouse, and the Lilac set has fetched as much as $66 in recent months. It dropped to the $40 mark for the first time last month with a $26 discount on its usual going rate before selling out, and it’s now back in stock and discounted down to the same $40 price. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this set, and it’s a good option to consider if you’re looking to pick up some new peripherals for your workstation. Head below for more details.

This particular tablet with an included Lenovo Tab Pen Pus stylus typically goes for $390, so you’re looking at a straight-up $143 discount on it right now. We’ve seen the brand’s more affordable Idea Tab models see some significant price drops in the past, but this is the first time we’re tracking a deal on this model. items.title: Ninja’s 45-quart FrostVault wheeled cooler keeps food separately chilled and dry at $230 (Reg. $300)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, through the official Woot storefront, you can currently pick up the Ninja FrostVault 45-quart Wheeled Cooler at $229.99 shipped. It’s coming down from $300 here, which we’ve previously seen go as low as $236 on Amazon back during July’s Prime Day event, while Black Friday and Christmas sales only saw it fall to $250. While we have seen it go lower at other retailers, particularly bargain-bin sites, you’re still looking at a solid 23% markdown that cuts $70 off the tag, making it a far more affordable score if you don’t have the money to pick up an electric cooler/freezer like the Anker SOLIX EverFrost 2 options.

items.title: Segway’s E3 Pro is my go-to e-scooter with 34-mile range, Apple Find My, more at second-best $550 pricing
items.summary:
Segway is currently offering its E3 Pro Electric Scooter at $549.99 shipped, which is also matching in price over at Amazon, too. While it is listed with a $700 MSRP direct from the brand, we’ve been seeing it hold out more often at $600 there, while starting at that rate over at Amazon. Discounts have been rarer and rarer since tariffs began weighing heavier on the American market in 2025, though we did last see it fall lower back during Black Friday when it hit its $500 low. If you missed out on that price, you’re getting the next-best rate here while these savings last, giving you $50 off the going rate (and $150 off the MSRP) for an e-scooter that has become my new go-to since going hands-on in our review last year. There are a few other models seeing varying discounts in the brand’s Amazon storefront here, while others are seeing their usual discounted rates offered direct from the brand’s website here.

more…
